title: Strictly's Chris Ramsey has fans in stitches yet again with facial expressions
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Strictly Come Dancing fans can't get enough of comedian Chris Ramsey's face.

Viewers were left in hysterics yet again by the 31 year-old's facial expressions as Tess Daly revealed he wouldn't be in the dreaded dance off.

Instead, David James and Mike Bushell battled it out - with David being sent packing after his jive failed to impress the judges.

Fans were quick to take to Twitter to laugh about the funnyman's hilarious expressions.

One chuckled: "Chris Ramsey's facial expressions on results night makes the whole programme tbh."

Another was a tad more intense, gushing: "There's no one I love more than Chris Ramsey."

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

A third loved Chris, but also poured praise on pro Johannes Radebe's showstopping opening dance: "My favourite things in the @bbcstrictly show tonight - Chris Ramsey's range of facial expressions, and watching @jojo_radebe SLAY!"

South African Johannes, who's partnered with Cornonation Street's Catherine Tyldesley, took to the routine in a pair of black high heels.

Fans reckoned the routine, which featured all of the show's grand roster of pros, was one of the best the show's ever put on.

(Image: BBC)

One wrote: "One of the best opening sequences in #strictly ever! Johannes rocked!"

Yesterday's show was a rollercoaster of emotion after Paralympian Will Bayley reduced half the judges to tears.

Alfonso and Motsi struggled to contain the water works after a moving performance preceded by a video of a visit to Great Ormond Street Hospital.

The rest of the show saw some results that fans didn't expect - including Emma Weymouth rocketing to joined second place on the Week Five leader board after surviving elimination last week by the skin of her teeth.

Saffron Barker and AJ Pritchard were the real champs, winning guest judge Alfonso's only 10 out of 10 of the show.
description: Viewers have been loving Chris' expressions when he found out he wasn't in the dance off
